locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ is real good at communicating  with customers. They did some upgrades here. The showers are big and have 2 shower heads so you can wash both sides at same time. Plenty of seating in showers and places to hang your shower bags The girl ‚Ä¶
Shower sucks. No counter space. Nowhere to put anything. Water pressure goes in and out, as well as hot & cold. Super annoying.
The staff at night is so nice and helpful. The man that cleans the shower is so sweet and there's only 2 showers but he gets them cleaned right away. I would definitely  park here again and stay..

Staff Is Friendly But Awkward! Lots Of Parking If You Want A Shower Better To Go To Loves! This Place Would Also Be Alot Cleaner If The Put Dog Potty Bags To Grab, People Need To Have Some If You Don't They Do Not Provide!

‚Ä¶ place.  Ohh let me tell you about this place! The staff AMAZING, the parking AMAZING, the bathrooms/shower AMAZING everything about this pilot was amazing! Only thing I didn‚Äôt like and it‚Äôs just me is they didn‚Äôt have ice cream. I was ‚Ä¶

I'll give this place 4 stars.. The food when available is good and reasonably priced. The showers and restrooms are clean. The shower is pricey at 17.00 but I had a credit. Shower 1 is absolutely awesome. 2 showerheads and a flexible hose. ‚Ä¶

A stupid and lazy employee made me wait for the shower for the customer to come out and bring the key, but she didn't want to leave, instead cleaning up her smartphone. Points were written off for the shower and it's a pity for the time ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ .  The staff are awesome and will help you find an item without any issue.  Large selection of snacks and food but not as large as Loves next door.  Shower area was clean during my visit.  The lot was very dirty as was the floor.  I ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ between Columbus, Oh & Ashland, Ky. Good coffee, soda & water selection, and grilled food is always fresh & hot. Bathrooms & showers are always clean. Employees are very polite & friendly too. I've been stopping here for years and I've ‚Ä¶

Showers are dated but clean. You have to get a key for the showers. Can't use the app for showers here. Store is clean and nice parking lot lay out here for easy parking. come back to this pilot had to wait for a shower lady said I will ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Place is good. It‚Äôs no worse no better than most. The thing I don‚Äôt get with places that have showers. Why aren‚Äôt they individually heated and cooled. You sweat after a shower in the summer and freeze after a shower in the winter. That‚Äôs ‚Ä¶

We ride in a semi, so we come across A LOT of truck stops and other Love's. It was very clean. The showers were upgraded and nice. Large shower rooms. Customer service was a little slow on helping. I stood at both registers for a bit before ‚Ä¶
Awesome truck stop,  shower #5 clean and roomy

‚Ä¶ very nice clean, awesome people very friendly. The bathrooms were spotless and so was my shower #2 was nice not any dirt grease or anything great water pressure and the water actually got hot! Was a great experience one of the best loves ‚Ä¶
Great Place to get Gas, food, Shower üöø etc ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ ppl. The big dude and two older lady cut the showers off from last night until 530 am because somebody called off yet all 3 of y‚Äôall sitting behind the counter yappy your gums instead of stepping up and taking care of business. I waited ‚Ä¶
The service is not very good, the shower is dirty. We hope that the situation will change for the better.
Stopped for the night and got a shower. ‚Ä¶

Reserved a shower and they canceled my reservation and told me I had to buy another one, desk doenst know what they are doing, didnt wear gloves when touching food and refused to refund it after touching my food with nasty ungloved hands, ‚Ä¶

Showers are relaxing for truck drivers. But here, it's stressful. The cleaning lady complains but doesn't clean. She only cleans after complaints. My husband inquired. She replied, "Take a shower at another truck stop!" The female employee ‚Ä¶

It‚Äôs sad how much this location has declined. As a driver we expect CLEAN showers and good food options. This truck stop is understaffed and falling apart. Dirty showers and the person cleaning them isn‚Äôt even using any cleaning equipment. ‚Ä¶

Terrible shower service. Only 2 people in line but you wait 74minutes to be alocated a shower. Takes forever to prepare a shower for the next guest. Showers will be empty for long before cleaning and reassigning next guest

They won't let us use showers because the electronic system is down. They admit they could still do it with a key and let people in but "that would be so much work for us". No kidding. Your job is literally to service the truck drivers! It' ‚Ä¶

1 star for the fact that they have 4 or 5 people working up front,  and 5 of 7 showers open & need cleaned. Waiting over 30 minutes for a shower but the people working inside can't be bothered to clean one. Only one guy does them & he's ‚Ä¶
Showers were cold and u clean.. the soap residue on the shower head made me think twice about going here over loves.

locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Please note that the staff responsible for cleaning the shower cabins are not doing their job. I came at 11:50 PM, and now it‚Äôs 12:15 AM. I can see that there are free showers, but no one has cleaned them for nearly half an hour. This means ‚Ä¶

Booked my shower. App says 8 min wait time

Came to take a  shower  a lot off shower that need to be clean  no one  is here to do so

8 people in line.
Try to call. Store and Gm  but no answer
Store is not keeping up white the app

Currently waiting 1.75 hours for a shower when it‚Äôs not even busy. They aren‚Äôt cleaning the showers, the TA app hasn‚Äôt updated since I placed the shower, nobody is answering the phone, easily top 10 worst truck stops I‚Äôve been too

I asking for the owner or manager,  I not know who the beard man work night time he just didn't glove take off when he touch sweat his head/beard/face when he gave us a towels/rags for shower.  The shower water was  good and not stink.  Nee ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ I don't fuel here so I had to buy a shower $14 which I thought was kind of expensive ‚Ä¶
15$ for parking I expected a clean shower. staff isn't very polite either. I won't be stopping here ever again, I'll go to the loves or sleep on the shoulder!

‚Ä¶ drinks or sugar free soft drinks and absolutely no sparkling waters. It‚Äôs been months since I‚Äôve taken a shower or ate at the establishment because of past disappointments. Overall It shows that the staff don‚Äôt give a damn about that ‚Ä¶

The good parts: Shower was excellent. Clean, good water pressure, hot water and nice towels. Best truck stop shower I've had in a long time. Restaurant was clean and service was quick and friendly. ‚Ä¶

Way too many paid parking spots.  Many places allow us to park in a reserved parking spot when it is early to get a quick shower and dinner.  Not this place!  I told the fuel attendant my truck number and what we were doing he rudely said ‚Ä¶
Restaurants close at 5pm. Nearly all the parking is paid. The water pressure in the shower sucks. There are better options nearby.

locations.content: A & A Truck Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: This is a TA now, nice big truck. Parking lot inside has a diner smells good. Lots of food options is high. Shower was clean and hot. They have the driver lounge as most do. Washer and dryer not set up yet. Staff is great. Would return
David McleanLocal Guide ¬∑ 836 reviews ¬∑ 960 photos
Showers are being renovated. Food is good. Lot is huge.

This truck stop is TA but you can't use points or anything else. It's a local A&A truck stop. The showers are very clean but are $17. No team showers are available. $17 per person. No one can use the fill station because it's not TA. There ‚Ä¶

Not new and Shiney but better than loves. Quiet lot no announcement speaker and bells all night. Easy parking plenty of space. The restaurant has limited hours but is very good. C store has everything you need. Also has a shop and trailer washout.
Lots a truck parking. Clean the only reason I didn't give them 5 stars is the restaurant food was ok service was terrible. It was like I was an inconvenience to the wait staff and kitchen.
